name: Insane Intern
description:
Insane Intern is a top-down shooter game where you play as a recently fired intern looking to get his revenge. Play through 3 short levels, then face your former boss head on.

Controls: W, A, S, D, Left Click

This game was made in 10 days for the VimJam2 game jam.

Credits:

Programmer, Opening Cutscene, Level Designer: AlbertRayquaza

Art: Yaxxon

Music: Francesco D'Agostino/CommanderLittle/CDRLittle
